body: @edgarriba I'm not sure to understand. If your observation is that whatever you put in `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES`, indexing in pytorch always start at 0 and then grow one by one, that is not a problem, that is the expected behavior. [This](http://acceleware.com/blog/cudavisibledevices-masking-gpus) may clarify things.
